column2: Group work was a decided strength.
column3: You were an active and thoughtful participant in class discussions, always willing to ask questions and provide thoughtful comments.
column4: /cname, your participation in class was excellent. You worked diligently on all class assignments, and asked meaningful questions which showed that you were truly engaged in the course material.

column2: Although you were a reserved participant in class, you were always willing to answer questions when called upon.
You worked well with your lab groups throughout the session sharing your own ideas and listening carefully and providing valuable feedback when your partners spoke.
column3: You worked efficiently and effectively with many of your lab partners carefully articulating your own insights and listening carefully to those of your partners.
column4: You listened carefully to your partners' ideas and provided thoughtful feedback before articulating your own insights.
column5: You contributed valuable insights to your groups, and listened carefully to your partners ideas.
